      • searchRecursive

        public void searchRecursive​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words,
                            int MAX_DEEP,
                            int MAX_PAGES_TO_SEARCH)
        Our main launching point for the Spider's functionality. Internally it creates spider legs that make an HTTP request and parse the response (the web page).
        Parameters:
        words - - The words or string that you are searching for
        MAX_DEEP - - Predefined links depth
        MAX_PAGES_TO_SEARCH - - Max visited page limit
